metadata.title: Perform immunostaining for epithelial and polarity markers

params.note: Immunostaining confirmed cell proliferation (Ki67) and lack of apoptosis (cleaved caspase 3) within AFOs.
AFO's epithelial identity confirmed by staining for pan-epithelial markers (EpCAM, E-CAD and pan-cytokeratin).
Absence of mesenchymal marker PDGFRα confirmed in AFOs.
AFO's epithelium is polarized, demonstrated by basolateral integrin β4 (ITGβ4), apical F-actin, and zonula occludens-1 (ZO-1)-positive luminal tight junctions.
